title: Rajveer Dairy
description: A responsive website built to promote fresh milk, dairy products, and traditional sweets. Highlights include product sections, smooth navigation, and clean visuals to enhance local brand visibility.

title: Naman's Photography
description: A minimal and elegant website designed to showcase high-resolution photography across genres like portraits, landscapes, and events. Focused on immersive layouts and gallery experience.

title: Task Management Tool
description: A task management tool with drag-and-drop functionality, team collaboration, and progress tracking.
